post_text: Brooklyn Scholars Kindergarten Teacher Ms. McKoy created a song for her Scholars for Fun Friday... #bscs
shared_text:
Judith Wallace is with Vanessa Davis.
April 4 at 11:50 AM ·

So like the rest of you I am confined to my home because of this awful virus. As a teacher I am forced to find ways to stay connected to my students. As a person I have to find ways to keep my sanity. Hence the creation of this song. I wrote a song about my class to the tune of one of my favorite songs. I posted the song on ClassDojo for my kids in honor of fun Friday. I also shared it with some of my colleagues. They all responded well to it. Some of the parents and my colleagues suggested that I post it on FB. I was hesitant because that is stepping out of my comfort zone. But then I thought why not? So here is a song about my class to the to the tune of Wind Beneath My Wing. Thanks Le Le (daughter) for helping me with the bridge of the song #mysidekick
